comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A long shot... According to NYT query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A03E1D9153CE633A... an R. D. Howell was a Nebraska republican representative at the 1912 convention.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: In 1915, query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E02E5DE113CE733A... names R.B. Howell as the Nebraska State Republican National Committeeman. So perhaps the 1912 article had the wrong initial and this is the right guy. So could this be the same as bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=H000868 who was a US Senator from Nebraska later.

comment._content:
